member.name: P:Outpost31.Core.Runtime.TngnConfiguration.ConfigurationSummary
member.summary: A summary of the runtime settings for exporting.

member.name: M:Outpost31.Core.Runtime.TngnConfiguration.cat_RequiredDirectories(System.String)
member.summary: Tingen Web Service required directories.
member.returns: A dictionary of directories required by the Tingen Web Service.

remarks.para:
The Tingen Web Service requires the following directories to be present:
AppData Various Tingen Web Service data.
AppData/Runtime Data the Tingen Web Service needs at runtime.

member.name: M:Outpost31.Core.Runtime.TngnConfiguration.cat_RequiredFiles(System.String)
member.summary: Tingen Web Service required files.
member.returns: A dictionary of files required by the Tingen Web Service.

remarks.para:
The Tingen Web Service requires the following files to be present in the .TingenWebService/AppData/Runtime directory:
tngn.build The Tingen Web Service build information.
tngn.hostdatapath The path on the host where the Tingen Web Service will store/retrieve data.
tngn.systemcode The Avatar System Code that the Tingen Web Service will interface with.

The Tingen Web Service requires the following files to be present in the %DataPath%\%SystemCode%\Congfig\Runtime directory:
tngn.mode The Tingen Web Service mode.

member.name: M:Outpost31.Core.Runtime.TngnConfiguration.cat_RequiredTngnDataFiles
member.summary: Tingen Web Service required files.
member.returns: A dictionary of files required by the Tingen Web Service.

remarks.para:
The Tingen Web Service requires the following files to be present in the .TingenWebService/AppData/Runtime directory:
tngn.build The Tingen Web Service build information.
tngn.hostdatapath The path on the host where the Tingen Web Service will store/retrieve data.
tngn.systemcode The Avatar System Code that the Tingen Web Service will interface with.

The Tingen Web Service requires the following files to be present in the %DataPath%\%SystemCode%\Congfig\Runtime directory:
tngn.mode The Tingen Web Service mode.

member.name: M:Outpost31.Core.Runtime.TngnConfiguration.cat_ValidSystemCodes
member.summary: Tingen Web Service valid Avatar System Codes.
member.returns: A list of Avatar System Codes that can be used with the Tingen Web Service.

remarks.para:
The Tingen Web Service will only interface with the following Avatar System Codes:
LIVE The Avatar production environment
UAT The Avatar testing environment

member.name: M:Outpost31.Core.Runtime.TngnConfiguration.cat_ValidTngnModes
member.summary: Valid Tingen Web Service modes.
member.returns: A dictionary of valid Tingen Web Service modes.

remarks.para:
The Tingen Web Service can have one of the following modes:
DISABLED The Tingen Web Service does not do any work.
ENABLED The Tingen Web Service functions normally.
PASSTHROUGH The Tingen Web Service writes log files, but does not make any modifications to data.

member.name: M:Outpost31.Core.Runtime.TngnConfiguration.RuntimeConfigSummary(Outpost31.Core.Runtime.TngnConfiguration)
member.summary: The summary of the Tingen Web Service configuration at runtime.
member.return: A summary of the Tingen Web Service configuration at runtime.

member.name: M:Outpost31.Core.Runtime.TngnConfiguration.Load(System.String)
member.summary: Load the runtime settings for the Tingen Web Service.
member.returns: Runtime settings for the Tingen Web Service.

remarks.para:
This method creates a Tingen Web Service configuration object at runtime.
Some of these properties are validated against hardcoded values.

member.name: T:Outpost31.Core.Runtime.Spin
member.summary: Startup/shutdown logic for the Tingen Web Service.

remarks.para: This method contains two methods that startup/shutdown the Tingen Web Service:

This class doesn't do much actual work, and should remain fairly static. For the
most part, it just hands information to Outpost31, where the heavy lifting is done.

member.name: P:Outpost31.Core.Runtime.Spin.ExeAsm
member.summary: The executing Assembly name.
member.remarks: A required component for writing log files, defined here so it can be used throughout the class.

The Tingen Web Service current version.

member.summary: Spin down the Tingen Web Service.

member.name: T:Outpost31.Core.Utility.Du.DuFile
member.summary: Logic related to files input/output.

member.name: M:Outpost31.Core.Utility.Du.DuFile.ReadLocal(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the contents or status of a file.

remarks.para:
If the file exists and has content, that content is returned.
If the file does not exist, or exists but is empty, an error message is returned.

member.returns: The content or status of the file.

member.name: M:Outpost31.Core.Utility.Du.DuFile.ReadAndVerifyLocal(System.String,System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String})
member.summary: Returns the contents (if valid) or status of a file.

remarks.para:
GetContent() returns the contents or status of the file.
If the file contains data, that data is checked against the list of valid content.

member.returns: The verified content or status of the file.

member.name: T:Outpost31.WelcomeToOutpost31
member.summary: A place for Outpost31 details and stuff.

remarks.para:
Outpost31 is the back-end logic for the Tingen web service.
This class is just a placeholder for documentation, and where the Outpost31 version number is
updated (see the header above).
While you're here, take a look at this stuff:
The Tingen Documentation
Uh...I guess that's it. Thanks for stopping by!
